וַיָּ֨מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died שָׁ֜ם <WH8033> sham there מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh So Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> 'e-ved- the servant יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz there in the land מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> mo-'Av of Moab עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- according פִּ֥י <WH6310> pi according to the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיִּבְכּוּ֩ <WH1058> vai-yiv-Ku wept בְנֵ֨י <WH1121> ve-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh for Moses בְּעַֽרְבֹ֥ת <WH6160> be-'ar-Vot in the plains מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> mo-'Av of Moab שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim thirty י֑וֹם <WH3117> Yom; days וַֽיִּתְּמ֔וּ <WH8552> vai-yit-te-Mu, were ended יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> ye-Mei so the days בְכִ֖י <WH1065> ve-Chi of weeping אֵ֥בֶל <WH60> 'E-vel [and] mourning מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. for Moses

וִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> vi-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- the son נ֗וּן <WH5126> Nun, of Nun מָלֵא֙ <WH4392> ma-Le was full ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach of the spirit חָכְמָ֔ה <WH2451> choch-mah of wisdom כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for סָמַ֥ךְ <WH5564> sa-Mach had laid מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh for Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> ya-Dav his hands עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav; and וַיִּשְׁמְע֨וּ <WH8085> vai-yish-me-'U hearkened אֵלָ֤יו <WH413> 'e-Lav on בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- upon him and the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su, unto him and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses
